Articles.Content: 2427: A room with non euclidean geometry. It took you around a hour to figure out where the stair is to the next flour

Floor: 2428

You enter a bakery and stock up on various baked goods. That explains the flour that was on the stairs.

You continue up.

1 hour ago, ffx said:

2427: A room with non euclidean geometry

That's HyperRogue?

Floor 2429: You find a middle-aged Kerbal playing HyperRogue. That would explain floor 2427.
2430:   The floor of floors and books and pigs and cookies.                                                              Also a poster with a group of kids running around it saying     .............
2341: The JWST is out of the window. It looks like the mirror is fully deployed!

Floor 2342: A room full of acronyms that nobody knows the meaning of without context but that others just assume people would know.

You see one that says WWSAT and try to puzzle it out as you climb up to the next floor.

2343:      Aha!    Who was stupid and Turkish!      As you say this you turn your head and find yourself in a deserted room.    You fell creepy.    You get the idea that the next couple rooms will be deserted and creepy.     There is a giant golf club that you climb on to get to the next floor

2344: But alas! There's far too many people on this floor to make out what's inside!

The air reeks of alcohol and sweat, poorly concealed by fragrances of varying quality.

The room is barely illuminated, shadowy silhouettes shuffling in a random manner.

You decide that this wasn't where you wanted to be.
Floor 2345: Finally you find a floor with toilets. It feels like you have been holding it in for a very long time.
Floor 2346: It seems like this floor has twice as many toilets than the previous.
Floor 2347: you get attacked by the positives
2348: You get overwhelmed by negatives so you have to go back to floor 2347
2347: WRONG THREAD! The mods kick you to floor 2349.
2349: A person waiting for the third great number war to start again.

post above should be 2348

floor 2349: heavy update is stored in the vault in this floor, surrounded with non euclidean maze

Floor 2352: After going back over your journey for the last few floors you realise that you are actualy now on 2352.

The previous floor was so wild that you realise you are now standing on the ceiling, so you take the down stairs to go up to the next floor.

There was only a snow globe showing a scene of rubber duckies floating down a river in this room.

Edited January 11, 2022 by ColdJ
Floor 2353 has an abnormally high ceiling and is poorly lit. Scraps of flooring panels lay strewn across the floor as if this space was once used to contain material for building additional floors.
Floor 2354: A particularly boring room filled with scrap metal. Disappointing.
Floor 2355: Now all that scrap metal makes sense as on this floor there are people welding and making art sculptures out of the metal.
Floor 2356: You play chess with the Kraken. You beat it and must escape its tentacles at next floor.
Floor 2357: You play jump rope with the tentacles then head on up.
Floor 2358: its just soup
Floor 2359: it's just borscht.

Floor 2360

Its a trap!

Floor 2361

Jeb unleashing the Kraken again
